caption.p: Chewable gel tablets’ mass variation: ( A) in an open plastic bag at room temperature (OR); ( B) in a plastic box in a freezer (PBF); ( C) in a plastic box in a refrigerator (PBR); ( D) in a squeezable plastic bag at room temperature (BR), the expired curve in ( D) shows that the tablets became moldy and were not weighed; n = 8; a— p < 0.05 vs. mass after 1 day.
